description: Run a Speedtest every hour and graph the results.
name: speedtest-tracker
note: Default Username and password is: `admin@example.com;password`. You currently need to edit the `database.sqlite` to change the login information, this will be fixed in a future release. Password is in crypt hash, you can use https://www.onlinewebtoolkit.com/hash-generator to generate a new password.
title: Speedtest Tracker
